title: All Together Now: Fridays with The Moth - Ivan Kuraev & Dante Jackson
description:
This week, two stories of childhood trials and tribulations. This episode is hosted by Aleeza Kazmi. Check out the extras for this episode to see photos of Dante and Ivan at the time of their stories - themoth.org/extras.

Hosted by: Aleeza Kazmi

Storytellers: Dante Jackson, Kuraev

This is our last episode of All Together Now: Fridays with The Moth. We hope you’ve enjoyed this summer series. Remember to visit our website for all the prompts from each episode.
itunes:subtitle: This week, two stories of childhood trials and tribulations.
itunes:author: The Moth
